full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,GTZUG TOR DKAR MO BZLOG BSGYUR BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008B (CES 'PHAGS MA GTZUG TOR DKAR MO BZLOG BSGYUR MI MTHUN GA-YUL LAS RNAM RGYAL ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, BLA MA DKON MCHOG GSUM LA MI PHYED PA'I DAD PA DANG LDAN PA DGE SLONG NOM CHE NANG SO SNGAGS DBANG SBYIN PA'I BSKUL BA'I NGO BSRUNG MCHED DU, ,RDO RJE 'CHANG DBANG SNYIGS MA'I DUS SU, NGUR SMRIG BSTAN 'DZIN GA RA BSGYUR BA RJE BTZUN RDO RJE 'CHANG DZA YA PAndI TA ZHES MTSAN YONGS SU GRAGS PA, 'DI NYID ZHABS KYI RDUL SPYI BOS LEN PA BKA' DRIN GYI CUNG ZAD MNOS PA BYANG PHYOGS SOG PO'I YUL 'DIR 'KHYIMS PA'I PHYOGS MED BLO ZHI MING CAN GYIS MKHAS PA'I GSUNG RGYUN LA BRTEN NAS BGYIS PAS 'DIS KYANG BDAG SOGS SEMS CAN THAMS CAD KYIS MI MTHUN PA'I GA-YUL LAS RNAM PAR RGYAL GYUR CIG , ,,) STONG 'OG PHYOGS 'TSAMS THAMS CAD DU, ,MKHA' 'GRO RA BA RDO RJE GUR, ,BSKAL PA'I ME DPUNG 'TSUB SHING KHYIL, ,RNAM RTOG LAS BYUNG BGEGS RNAMS KUN, ,MTSAMS BCAD NANG 'DI 'TSUN CHAD DU, ,NAM YANG 'DA' BAR MA GYUR CIG ,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,
